product_description: Bacon Ranch Chicken Salad, Tuscan Sun brand, is a ready to eat sandwich.  Net wt. 9.3 oz (263g).  UPC 0 43701 01417 4.    Product was distributed frozen or refrigerated (fresh) to stores.  Frozen product is not sold directly to consumers and it will be thawed by stores prior selling to consumers.  Refrigerated product is sold directly to consumers.  Product is packaged in a modified atmosphere packaging (MAP).    The label is read in parts: "***Bacon Ranch Chicken Salad on 9 Grain *** TUSCAN SUN GOURMET SANDWICHES***Keep Refrigerated ***JUMBO FOODS INC. MUKILTEO, WA***".
reason_for_recall: Product is recalled due to a potential for contamination with Listeria monocytogenes.
